snippet.title: What distinguishes the savanna and grassland biomes? A. woody plants b. Large predators c. seasonal precipitation d. Herds of herbivores.
snippet.description: The correct answer is C, seasonal precipitation.

snippet.title: Are there grasslands in Europe?
snippet.description: Yes, there are grasslands in Europe, mainly in Northwest Europe. !
